snippet: Britain's armed forces are quickly heading toward their lowest levels in a century. France, which was the first European country to openly back the Syrian opposition, will shrink its forces 7 percent in 2013.
abstract: Britain's armed forces are quickly heading toward their lowest levels in a century. France, which was the first European country to openly back the Syrian opposition, will shrink its forces 7 percent in 2013.

headline.main: Can Europe's Shrinking Military Back up Its Commitments to Syria?
